name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Howard William BOOFER, Appellee

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Howard William BOOFER, Appellee.
attorneys: David L. Cook, Robert F. Hawk, Asst. Dist. Attys., Butler, for appellant.
William D. Kemper, Dillon, McCandless, King & Kemper, Butler, Court-appointed, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 242
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Howard William BOOFER, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 6, 1978.
Decided April 7, 1978.
David L. Cook, Robert F. Hawk, Asst. Dist. Attys., Butler, for appellant.
William D. Kemper, Dillon, McCandless, King & Kemper, Butler, Court-appointed, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
